content: *pretty bouquet of daffodils will bring spring into your life all year round with their sunny cheerful color yarnspirations * skill level easy materials lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds contrast a yellow 00010 *1 ball* * 1 ball makes 7 daffodils * contrast b sage green 00084 *1 ball* * 1 ball makes 35 leaves * contrast c eggshell 00005 *1 ball* size 4 00 mm u s g or 6 crochet hook glue thread coated wire for stems daffodil make 6 leaf make 12 pdf modified april 5 2004 no photo daffodil bouquet 1 shown on calendar page march 26 2009 similar to but not the same as daffodil bouquet #23 2 1 https //s3 amazonaws com/com yarnspirations pattern-pdfs/lily_sugarncream010_cr_daffodils en_us pdf 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/daffodil-bouquet-23
